values: Where Is God? The Supremacy of Christ in an Age of TerrorWhere Is God? The Supremacy of Christ in an Age of Terror

God does not answer all our questions, but he doesn’t leave us in the dark either. His deepest and loudest response to our pain is the suffering and death of his Son.God does not answer all our questions, but he doesn’t leave us in the dark either. His deepest and loudest response to our pain is the suffering and death of his Son.
